pkg.name: feature-link-list
pkg.title: Feature link list
pkg.description: Feature link list is a vertical list of important links. It adds prominence and additional information to help users find and understand the navigation items.

scope.title: Feature link list
scope.description: Feature link list is a vertical list of important links. It adds prominence and additional information to help users find and understand the navigation items.

relatedComponents.name: card
relatedComponents.title: Card
relatedComponents.description: Also known as Tiles, Cards are a layout component that link to more information on a topic.

relatedComponents.name: inpage-nav
relatedComponents.title: Inpage nav
relatedComponents.description: Also known as Page contents, Inpage nav links help users scan page contents and quickly navigate to different sections.

relatedComponents.name: link-list
relatedComponents.title: Link list
relatedComponents.description: Link list is a simple set of vertical or horizontal links used for site navigation and to order information for users.

relatedComponents.name: list
relatedComponents.title: List
relatedComponents.description: Lists are vertical groupings of related items that can be displayed either in an unordered or ordered format.
